title: If Riot Games ever make another game, what would that game be?
body: I am not saying that Riot has to make another game. There's a lot of room to create, develop, and improve in League of Legends. Although I kind of burned out on League sometime ago, the young game is soaring right now. I am kind of curious, though, if there are any ideas being tossed around for a second game. Just ponderin'. Anyways, let me know what yall think.
